H0.text: Which organization launched the Firefox smartphone operating system in 2013, targeting the developing world. Google

H1.text: Which organization launched the Firefox smartphone operating system in 2013, targeting the developing world. Nokia

H2.text: Which organization launched the Firefox smartphone operating system in 2013, targeting the developing world. Samsung

H3.text: Which organization launched the Firefox smartphone operating system in 2013, targeting the developing world. Mozila

A4.text: Mozilla announced plans for its global commercial roll‑out of Firefox OS in February 2013.
